Articles.Content: Can someone make a brain in a glass dome as a probe core. Maybe make it use electric charge and a little oxidizer to keep it alive.
I remember seeing one of those some where, I think one of the open part contests, but I dont remember where, and it is too late for me to look right now, I will take a look tomorow
The old MechJeb used to have a part (a couple actually) that was effectively this. That is where I would start looking.
